discourse_list.title: Secret Network Looking for Developer Help

content.content: Hey ETH devs! Popping in to relay that Secret Network has announced a huge grant program for devs. We’re really looking for some awesome devs to get involved in building programmable privacy-enabled applications in all sorts of areas; especially DeFi. The article has tons of examples:   scrt.network    Announcing the Secret Network Grant Program Secret Network is growing fast - now you can grow with us. Come build Secret Apps, network improvements, and ecosystem tools, and receive grants for your efforts!      If anyone is interested in chatting I’d love to. You guys are all top notch in here. On telegram I am @BKBlockchain and I spend most of my time there  Otherwise you can also shoot me an email at Brendan@secret.foundation.
